NOT_FOUND.TITLE: Oops!
NOT_FOUND.DESCRIPTION: We couldn't find the page you were looking for. Please use the menu at the top of the page.

CHAT_ROOM.TITLE: Chat room
CHAT_ROOM.DESCRIPTION: Your place to meet other listeners, get shouts and tune IDs!

DONATE.TITLE: Please donate
DONATE.YOUR_DONATIONS_HELP: Your donations help to pay our site and server bills!

SCHEDULE.TITLE: Schedule
SCHEDULE.CHECK_BACK_REGULARLY: Check back regularly for schedule updates and details of guest shows!
SCHEDULE.FIND_OUT_MORE: You can find out more about the DJs featured by entering the Profiles section.
SCHEDULE.TIMES_DISPLAYED: Times displayed are for London, UK.

MUSIC.TITLE: Music
MUSIC.INTRO: Break Pirates shows feature a whole range of different music styles. Select a genre from the list below to view current scheduled shows.

PROFILES.TITLE: Profiles
PROFILES.INTRO: Want to find out more about who you're listening to? Select a member of the team from the list below!
PROFILES.LISTEN_ON_MIXCLOUD: Listen to recorded shows from {{ name }} on Mixcloud

SOCIAL.TITLE: Social
SOCIAL.USE_OWN_APP: Want to use your own app?
SOCIAL.CHAT_SERVER_DETAILS: Join #{{ ircChannel }} on Hostco IRC network (server: {{ ircServer }}, port: {{ ircPort }}). You'll need a copy of mIRC (www.mirc.co.uk), LimeChat, IceChat or a similar IRC client.
